name: mixpad-benchmark
description: Performance benchmarking for Mixpad scanner vs competitors

scripts.build:ts: cd ../.. && npm run build && cd parser/benchmark && esbuild run-competitive.ts --bundle --outfile=run-competitive-built.js --format=cjs --platform=node --external:marked --external:markdown-it --external:micromark --external:commonmark
scripts.install-competitors: npm install --no-save marked markdown-it micromark remark commonmark
